attributes.action: help address the current prejudice against motorcycles in this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Off-Road Vehicles (Registration) Bill currently making its way through parliament applies only to motorcycles and quad-bikes - not cars or 4x4s.  So all bikes, including racing bikes, dirt-bikes and classic and collector's bikes will have to be registered or else destroyed.  Many can't be registered because they don't meet modern safety standards. But all cars will be exempt.

Several private companies have recently banned or restricted the use of motorcycles by employees when on company business.

Most recently and outrageously of all, the police in North Wales have launched a road-safety campaign featuring photographs of a decapitated motorcyclist without even consulting his family first.

This level of persecution would not be accepted against any other sector of society, and shouldn't be accepted against bikers.
